title: Can I get Ambient temperature to show up on my lock screen. It shows up on my home screen.
content: My Lock screen only shows time and date.  I would like it to also show ambient temperature on Locked screen.  Is there any way to see ambient temperature on the Lock screen so that I can just look at my phone and see what the temperature is outside?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
